rgee 0.0.1

rgee

Buildings for the Python Earth Engine API

rgee provides a convenient way to interact with the Google Earth Engine since R. It does not interact directly with the Earth Engine REST APIs but, through reticulate, create a stable bridge with the Python Earth Engine API.

The main user relevant functions are:

  • ee_initialize: Authenticate and Initialize the Earth Engine API.
  • ee_map: Display a given ee_Image, ee_Feature, ee_FeatureCollection or ee_ImageCollection using mapview.
  • ee_download: Download Earth Engine objects (via googledrive::drive_download())

Installation (Not available yet)

For CRAN release version of rgee use

install.packages("rgee")

To install the development version install the devtools package.

devtools::install_github("ryali93/rgee")

workflow
